document.full_text: former french open champion ana ivanovic was reduced to tears on tuesday wondering what had gone wrong after a first-round defeat at roland garros three years after winning the title.
document.title: tears and frustration for beaten ivanovic
lines_and_colors: former french open champion ana ivanovic was reduced to tears on tuesday wondering what had gone wrong after a first-round defeat at roland garros three years after winning the title.
